# Security Policy

-   This is Authme's security policy.

## Supported Versions

-   There are the currently supported versions:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x.x   | :x:                |
| 2.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

-   Please report security vulnerabilitys in email at: <authme@levminer.com>
